BLOCK.QRY: UPDATE ACTPAY_ARREAR_FREEZE_DTL T SET T.STR_DEMAND_STATUS=? WHERE T.STR_DEMAND_NO=? AND T.GNUM_ISVALID=0 and T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE ACTPAY_ARREAR_AUDIT_TRN SET STR_AUDIT_APPROVAL=?,DT_DATE_OF_AUDIT=?,STR_AUDIT_ID=?,STR_REMARKS=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE STR_DEMAND_NO=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE ACTPAY_ARREAR_FREEZE_DTL T SET T.STR_DEMAND_STATUS=? WHERE T.STR_DEMAND_NO=? AND T.GNUM_ISVALID=0 and T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE ACTPAY_ARREAR_FREEZE_DTL T SET T.STR_DEMAND_STATUS=? WHERE T.STR_DEMAND_NO=? AND T.GNUM_ISVALID=0 and T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE ACTPAY_ARREAR_AAO_TRN SET STR_AAO_APPROVAL=?,DT_DATE_OF_APPROVAL=?,STR_AAO_ID=?,STR_REMARKS=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE STR_DEMAND_NO=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE ACTPAY_ARREAR_FREEZE_DTL T SET T.STR_DEMAND_STATUS=? WHERE T.STR_DEMAND_NO=? AND T.GNUM_ISVALID=0 and T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE ACTPAY_ARREAR_FREEZE_DTL T SET T.STR_DEMAND_STATUS=? WHERE T.STR_DEMAND_NO=? AND T.GNUM_ISVALID=0 and T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE ACTPAY_ARREAR_DUMMY_DTL T SET T.NUM_PARAMETER_AMOUNT=?,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=to_date(?,'dd-mon-yyyy'),T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND last_day(T.DT_ARREAR_GENT_DATE)=last_day(to_date(?,'mm/yyyy')) AND last_day(T.DT_APPLICABLE_MONTH)=last_day(to_date(?,'mm/yyyy')) AND T.STR_ARREAR_TYPE=? AND T.GNUM_ISVALID=1 and t.STR_PARAMETER_CODE=? AND T.STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER=?
